settings.title: Become a VIP member
settings.text:
Mota VIP members receive exclusive discounts and offers from thousands of Australia's leading brands.

As a Mota member, you’ll have access to discounts, special deals, gift cards and cashback offers from over 4,000 popular brands across the categories of Automotive, Health, Travel, Dining, Entertainment, Sports + Fitness, Beauty, Home, Camping + Outdoors, Wine + Spirits, Groceries and more...

These offers are not avaiable to the public. Members can save up to $7,000 a year on the discounts provided on everyday items, products and services.

Members can access the full suite of offers once logged in as a member.

We hope you enjoy all the benefits and perks of becoming a member.

settings.subtitle: VIP Membership
settings.title: automatic multiplying entires into single every giveaway
settings.text: VIP members never miss a chance to win! You are automatically entered into every draw. Start your membership today to begin building entries.

settings.title: BECOME A VIP MEMBER
settings.description: The best part about becoming a VIP member is that is pays for itself, plus some... Mota gives you access to incredible savings and offers from over 4,000 Australian brands + retailers, offers and discounts that are not available to the general public. Once a VIP package is purchased, simply login as a member to access. VIP members receive entries into every single giveaway, your entries accumulate each month giving you the best chance to win!

settings.subtitle: Charities we love
settings.title: Every Giveaway supports Charity
settings.text:
MOTA team couldn't be more proud to suppor the Royal Melbourne Children's Hospital. Mota Team are currently sponsoring a bed in the Kookaburra Ward for children battling cancer. Mota team has made a 3 year commitment to sponsor the Royal Melbourne Children's Hospital Kookaburra cancer treatment ward. Mota will be sponsoring an additional bed at the Children's Hospital for every new car member giveaway we run. 

We are extremely happy to be able to help in this way to the amazing work the team at the Children's Hospital are doing. They are absolute angels!

settings.title: or GET YOUR SINGLE ENTRIES & limited membership NOW
settings.description: Single ticket entries are open for 1967 Ford Mustang Fastback draw only.
